summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Discord Bot Dashboard - Iteration 8. All 31 backend API tests passed (100% success rate). Fixed ImportError in send_reaction_role_embed endpoint. Frontend UI fully functional with all features working correctly.
passed_tests: API: POST /api/auth/login with invalid credentials - 401 Unauthorized
API: PUT /api/guilds/{guildId} with disabled_games array - 200 OK
Frontend: Login page loads with E-Mail and Passwort fields
Frontend: Login with admin@test.de / admin123 successful
Frontend: Dashboard loads with sidebar navigation
Frontend: All navigation items visible (Dashboard, Moderation, Berechtigungen, Temp Kanäle, Reaction Roles, Spiele, Tickets, Leveling, Willkommen, Commands, KI Chat, News, Einstellungen, Benutzer)
Frontend: Tickets page loads with 'Neues Panel' button
Frontend: Tickets page shows stats cards (Offen, Beansprucht, Geschlossen, Gesamt)
Frontend: Tickets page shows Ticket-Panels section with 'Senden' button
Frontend: Tickets page shows Letzte Tickets section
Frontend: Tickets page shows Discord Befehle section
Frontend: Reaction Roles page loads with 'Neue Reaction Role' button
Frontend: Reaction Roles page shows Button and Emoji info cards
Frontend: Reaction Roles page shows Aktive Reaction Roles with 'Senden' buttons
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page loads with 'Neuer Creator' button
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page shows Temp Voice Creators section
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page shows Aktive Temp-Channels section
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page shows Discord Befehle section
Frontend: Games page loads with 'Discord Spiele' title
Frontend: Games page shows '12 Spiele verfügbar • 12 aktiviert'
Frontend: Games page has Global Settings with 'Spiele aktivieren' toggle
Frontend: Games page has Spiele-Kanal selector
Frontend: Games page has Cooldown slider (30s)
Frontend: Games page has 'Alle aktivieren' and 'Alle deaktivieren' buttons
Frontend: Games page shows stats cards (Gespielt, Aktiviert, Aktiv, Top Spieler)
Frontend: Games page has all 6 category filter buttons (Alle Spiele, Klassiker, Wissen, Zufall, Geschicklichkeit, Spaß)
Frontend: Games page shows all 12 games with individual toggle switches
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed ImportError in server.py line 741: removed unused import 'get_reaction_role_by_id'
All API endpoints properly implemented with correct CRUD operations
Auto-Send feature working for both Ticket Panels and Reaction Roles
pending_actions queue system properly implemented for Discord bot integration
Games page correctly implements 12 games with individual toggles and 6 category filters
UI design is consistent with Discord-style dark theme
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_ prefixed temp creators, ticket panels, reaction roles, and level rewards during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs working: /api/auth/login, /api/guilds/{guildId} (GET, PUT), /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators (CRUD), /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels (CRUD + send), /api/guilds/{guildId}/reaction-roles (CRUD + send), /api/guilds/{guildId}/level-rewards (CRUD), /api/guilds/{guildId}/server-data (GET), /api/guilds/{guildId}/games (GET, stats), /api/guilds/{guildId}/tickets (GET, stats), /api/bot/status (GET). Frontend fully functional with all feature pages. Games page has 12 games with individual toggles and 6 category filters. Tickets and Reaction Roles have 'Senden' buttons for auto-send to Discord. Test credentials: admin@test.de / admin123, Guild ID: 807292920734547969.
